name: Why The Frog Crossed The Road
name_original: Why The Frog Crossed The Road
description:
Frog crossings are used by conservationists to help prevent frogs being killed during the breeding season.

In this game you are a volunteer at a frog crossing and must use your bucket to help them cross the busy road to their pond.

- Help frogs cross a road.

- Use 'WASD' or arrow keys to move.

- Get close to a frog to add them to your bucket.

- Frogs will try and run from you.

- 'E' or 'Space' releases the frogs in your bucket.

- You can only have a few frogs in a bucket at time.

- Wear a high vis to prevent being hit by cars.

- Try and save as many frogs as possible in the time.

Made for - Mini Jam 106: Frogs
